body_text: This adds a super bare-bones, not-cute-yet control app to replace the default admin. I've also implemented some of the authentication logic but it's really buggy and needs some help. There's still a lot to do on this but feel free to pick at it in the meantime. I'll be back on later tonight to update this with more notes and thoughts and questions.

title: [Bug 1257267] Add new control admin
body: This adds a super bare-bones, not-cute-yet control app to replace the default admin. I've also implemented some of the authentication logic but it's really buggy and needs some help. There's still a lot to do on this but feel free to pick at it in the meantime. I'll be back on later tonight to update this with more notes and thoughts and questions.
